name: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - National Window Flags
detailed_description: Represent your country while on the road! There are special occasions when a proper sports fan simply must root for their team. Wouldn't it be cool if it was also possible inside the world of Euro Truck Simulator 2? National Window Flags DLC allows you to put up flag poles on your truck, featuring hundreds of country flags listed by the International Organization for Standardization.
